title: (x) Eiskarte Prosecco & Sekt - Compacta {Tiff}
content:
Hi there,

could you please name the used font showed in the attachment? Thanks for your help… Best, flo

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [alex.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=alex.jpg) | 21.93 KB |
author: flinhardt

comments.content: Looks a lot like [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20060222162430/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/compacta/) to me.
Not quite. The font is a bit more “dirty”

Florian,

It sure looks like Compacta, like Tiffany suggested. The baselines have been shifted on the letters, and it could’ve been photoshopped or printed (low quality, or special paper) to get the rougher effect.
You could always use [this technique](http://web.archive.org/web/20060222162430/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/2005/10/how_to_create_a.cfm#21) to roughen up Compacta.
